## Steps to reproduce

[InitialSessionState]::CreateFromSessionConfigurationFile("c:\IDoNotExist.pssc", { $true })
## Expected behavior

PSInvalidOperationException
## Actual behavior

```
Exception calling "CreateFromSessionConfigurationFile" with "2" argument(s): "Could not find file
'c:\IDoNotExist.pssc'."
At line:1 char:1
+ [InitialSessionState]::CreateFromSessionConfigurationFile("c:\IDoNotE ...
+ ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
    + CategoryInfo          : NotSpecified: (:) [], MethodInvocationException
    + FullyQualifiedErrorId : CommandNotFoundException
```
## Environment data

<!-- If running the latest released version, specify the version, i.e. -->

v0.4.0
